description:
Pass Shield now has full Google Docs integration!
+ Export your data to Google Docs for easy backup and retrieval
+ Import usernames & passwords from a Google Docs spreadsheet
+ Have your passwords in a spreadsheet on your computer? Simply upload it to Google Docs, and then import it into Pass Shield!

Use Pass Shield to organize and store all of your login credentials in one secure location. Create a single master password for Pass Shield to ensure that only you can access your data. Need to store other information too, like credit card numbers, social security numbers, driver’s license number, license plates, and more? Pass Shield can do that too!

All data is safely stored using strong encryption algorithms.

Pass Shield is available in English only.
versionNote: Fixed integration issues with Google Docs. If you are using Google's 2-step verification feature, please remember to generate an application-specific password for Pass Shield.
